question: Which of the following crystals has the unit cell such that <katex>$a=b\ne c$</katex> and <katex>$\alpha=\beta=90^{\circ}$</katex>, <katex>$\gamma=120^{\circ}$</katex>? [cite: 281]
explanation: The parameters <katex>$a=b\ne c$</katex>, <katex>$\alpha=\beta=90^{\circ}$</katex>, <katex>$\gamma=120^{\circ}$</katex> correspond to the Hexagonal crystal system. Graphite crystallizes in a hexagonal lattice. [cite: 284, 286]
